```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr); library(corrplot)
citation("dplyr")
citation("corrplot")

n_pxrf <- read.table("data/n-pXRF.xlsx")
npxrf <- n_pxrf %>% select_if(~!all(is.na(.)))

summary(npxrf)

cor(npxrf) %>% corrplot (type = "lower", tl.cex = 0.7, tl.pos="d", cl.pos="r")

pca_xrf <- prcomp(na.omit(npxrf))

```
